moves.1. e4: My opponent went for kings pawn game.
moves.1... e5: One of the most popular response.
moves.2. c3: Ruy Lopez opening or MacLeod Attack.
moves.4. Qb3: suddenly my f7 pawn is in trouble, and he badly need support.
moves.4... d5: My mistake, when 5. exd5 Nxf5 6. Bxf5, I cannot take with my Queen, and if 6....Be6? 7. Bxe6 fxe6 8. Qxe6+ and I will lost even more material.
moves.5. exd5: Normally my opponent went for exchange.
moves.6. Bxd5 Qf6: Here I was thinking if he go for 7. Bxe7+ Qxe7 8. Qxe7+ Kxe7 I would gain my material back. Well I would be a pawn down.
moves.7. Nf3: My opponent is continuing with his development.
moves.7... Be6: ? Another mistake by me, if he goes for 8. Bxe6 Qxe6 9. Qxe6 fxe6, I would have doubled pawns on e file and I would not gain any material back. One of option in my mind was to offering him a b7 pawn, but if he goes for exchange, I'm in trouble.
moves.8... Qxe6: I have no option. I think 8....fxe6 is even worse.
moves.9. Qxb7: Opa, I have this move in my mind before, but really I did not pay attention to this move, because my opponent was already in material advantage, and I thought he would go for the Queen exchange.
moves.9... Kd7: So I say if you are greedy, go and eat my peaces, in meanwhile I will prepare attack on your king.
moves.10. Qxa8: Ok I have trapped his Queen, she will be there for a while.
moves.10... e4: Let's go and open some files.
moves.11. O-O: ? Better was 11. Ng5, but then again if 11....Qf5 his Knight is lost anyway. What is the best move here, I leave it open to your comment.
moves.11... exf3: I took his Knight, and I know what would be his next move. Do you? :)
moves.12. gxf3: Was this move in your mind? And here I saw some combination, and I went for it. But first his Queen was on a8-h1 diagonal, and I need this diagonal to be free.
moves.12... Bc5: And the best move to do it, is to donate my rook.
moves.13. Qxh8: ? He must stay on h1-a8 diagonal 13. Qb7
moves.13... Ne5: I put another trap to my opponent. If he chooses to play 14. Re1 Nxf3+ 15. Kf1 Qxe1# or 15. Kh1 Qxe1+ 16. Kg2 Qxf2+....
moves.14. d4: ? I think he should come out whit his Queen by 14. Qxg7
moves.14... Nxf3+: 15. Kh1 Qh3 16. Bf4 Qxf1# or 16. Nd3 Qxh2# or 16. Qxg7 Qxh2#
moves.15. Kg2: The best move in this situation.
moves.15... Qg4+: That is why he need his Queen on g file.
moves.16. Kh1 Nh4: I don't know why I didn't play 16....Qh3. It would be a faster mate.
moves.17. Rg1: The only move to prevent mate in next move. Which would come, if I played 16....Qh3
moves.17... Qf3+ 18. Rg2 Qxg2#: Thank you for watching this annotation. Any comments or rating is welcome. Have a nice day!
